Reference

All functions

IMF_docs_urls

dataset containing the urls of the documents extracted from IMF archives

TextMiningCrisis-package

Natural Language Processing (NPL) for economic crisis

aggregate_corpus()

Aggregate pdf files into list of characters

binary_freq_trans()

binary transformation of tfidf transform table from Number of occurence to binary variables

check_extract()

check the validity of each steps in the scripts to see what documents are lost in each step of the process from the download, to the text mining and finally to the merging with the rest of the variables

check_gaps_pdfs()

check if there are gaps greater than one year in the documents

clean_text()

clean character strings

cosim()

Compute cosinus similarity of two vectors

cosim_fig()

barpot of the cosinus similarity

cosim_matrix()

Compute all pairwise cosinus similarity for a dataframe of indexes

country_radar_dt()

depreciated use radar_dt() depreciated use radar_dt()

country_radar_fig()

depreciated use radar_shocks_fig() depreciated use radar_shocks_fig()

eval_pages()

Look for the presence of the targetword into a character string Provide list of files and return summary of counts of occurence of the target world

find_associated_keywords()

depreciated use lexicon_details() depreciated use lexicon_details()

find_pages()

depreciated use get_pages() depreciated use get_pages()

get_pages()

Find the page where words a located Provide files either pdf of html and return the paragraphs matching the targetted word

get_sentences()

From a corpus (collection documents), returns the sentences where keyword detected and respective keyword

idf()

Compute the inverse document frequency

idf_barplot()

barplot for the idf

key_words_crisis()

depreciated: use lexicon(), depreciated: use lexicon(),

lexicon()

Lexicon of economic crisis

lexicon_details()

Provide the keywords associate to the name of the category

lexicon_typology()

provide the typology of each category

log_norm_trans()

log normal transformation of the table log normal transformation of the table

pdf_from_url()

download pdf documents download from a a dataframe containing the url of the files the pdf of interest

pdf_page_count()

count the number of pages in the pdf count the number of pages in the pdf

plot_cos_sim()

depreciated use cosim_fig() depreciated use cosim_fig()

print(<corpusTM>)

Printing CorpusTM S3 method for class "corpus.TM"

radar_dt()

Transform the tf-idf database in proper format for drawing the radar chart of categories

radar_reforms_fig()

Radar chart of the tf

radar_shocks_fig()

Radar chart of the tf

radar_structure_fig()

Radar chart of the tf

remove_stop()

remove stop words

run_tf()

Compute the tf matrix for a corpus given in a list format,

run_tf_by_chunk()

run the term frequency matrix on the list of urls provided as parameter.

run_tf_update()

Updates the tf-indexes without repeating full extraction

tf()

Compute the term freqeuency matrix for each document in the corpus the function creates a table counting the occurence of the words in the vector of keywords and provide a table with the number of occurence, name of the file that is the name of each document in the corpus

tf_barplot()

barplot of term frequencies

tf_by_group()

Summarize the term frequency matrix by group Summarize the tf matrix according to the grouping variable selected

tf_idf()

Compute the tf-idf matrix

tf_vector()

vectorize the function tf() to be able to pass a list of names of keywords keyword_list is a list containing the names of different groups of keywords that have a vector of words to look into.

typology_categories()

depreciated use lexicon_typology() depreciated use lexicon_typology()
